Author: ALittleBitChowderNow
Text: I'm sorry you're feeling so low.  Your mother was always proud of you, by the sounds of it.  I'm sure she is still proud of you now.  Please look into Complex PTSD.  Based on what you wrote, you may be facing some post-trauma issues (or current trauma, because it sounds like your dad is still being emotionally/verbally abusive).  Take care of yourself the best you can today.
